column1: Fuller in length, just outside off and nips back a bit, drives it well but straight to cover fielder
good come back delivery, pitches on off stump and angling across the right hander, Chari tries to push at it and gets beaten
good length ball, on off stump, comes well forward and defends to cover
bit wider ouside off and moves away, easy leave for Chari
Shot! Slightly fuller just outside off, Chari leans well forward, drive and times it well in the gap between point and cover for four
full ball, just outside off and moves away, covers the line of the off stump and lets it go through to keeper
back of length, pitchse on off stump and moves away a bit, Chibhabha goes back and defends to off side
good length ball, just outside off, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man to gets off the mark
short and wide well outside off, left alone, Aleem Dar signals for a wide
full and bit wide outside outside off, moves further away, Charis goes for a big booming drive, gets beaten
back of length, on off stump, angles it down to third man for a single
That is a superb shot! Back of length, Chibhabha rises with the bounce and punches it away in front of point fielder for four
full ball, on middle and leg stump, gets right behind the line and pushes it to mid-on
good short ball, on leg stump, Charis ducks underneath it
again full ball, on off stump and swings back into the right hander, good stride forward and defends to cover
good leave by Chari, pitches on off stump and angling across, covers the line of the off stump and lets it go
again on same line and swings back into the right hander, gets well forward and defends to cover
full and just outside off, tries to drive, mistimes to mid-off
lovely delivery, pitches on middle stump and swings away with some extra bounce, Charis tries to defend, clips the pad on the way to keeper, shout for caught behind, turned down by umpire
on middle and leg stump, turned away to backward square leg for a single
short and wide outside off, lets it go and called a wide
full ball, on target, comes well forward and defends to mid-off
again good length ball, on middle stump, defends with the straight bat towards mid-off
full and bit wide outside off, tries to drive, thick outside edge, Imam dives and takes the pace off
good sharp bouncer, goes for the pull and gets beaten by pace
good length ball, on off stump, Chibhabha gets back and across and defends to off side
another good delivery, pitches on off stump and angling across, Chari tries to defend, misses the edge through to keeper
good bouncer, Chari ducks under it
good length ball, on target, gets right behind the line and defends to off side
fuller in length, just outside off and left alone
again full ball, just wide outside off, Chari drives away from the body, edges well wide of 2nd slip and no chance for the third man fielder to stop that one
another cracking delivery, pitches on off stump, moves away with some extra bounce, Chari comes well forward and tries to defend, gets beaten
Gone! Length ball, just outside off, moves away with some extra bounce, Chibhabha tries to cut that one, gets a thick outside edge in the safe hands of Rizwan behind the stumps
full ball, on off stump, comes well forward and defends to off side
short in length, just outside off and left alone
good length ball, on leg stump, hits the pad and missing leg, shout for lbw, turned down
back of length, pitches outside off and moves away, lets it go
back of length, on leg stump, worked away down to fine leg for a single
good length ball, on off stump, goes back and defends to off side
good length ball just outside off, opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
another fantastic delivery but running without luck, pitches on off stump and angling across, tries to play at it and gets beaten
full on target, defended to cover
full ball, pitches on leg stump and nips back a bit, tries to play across the line, hits the pad and going down the leg side, shout for lbw, turned down
good length ball, outside off and moves away, Charis leaves that one, bad bounce in front of Rizwan who fails to collect the ball and cost four byes
short in length, on leg stump, goes back and defends to leg side
full ball, on off stump, drives to mid-off
good sharp bouncer, goes for the pull and hits him on the arm
full ball on off stump, tries to defend, inner edge goes down to fine leg for a single
good length ball, on leg stump, worked away to deep square leg for couple
good short ball, just outside off, tries to pull and gets a beaten
good length ball, just outside off and moves away, lets it go
Played on! Musa makes a mark with his 2nd delivery in ODIs. Pitches on off stump and swings back in a bit, tries to play away from the body, gets a thick inside edge back onto stumps
good short ball, pace, bounce and movment in it, goes big on Taylor who tries to push at it and gets beaten
fuller in length, on off stump, comes forward and defends to off side
full ball, outside off, drives to mid-off
good length ball, just outside off and moves away, lets it go through to keeper
Back of length on leg stump, Charis flicks it away to long leg fence for four
again good length ball, on leg stump, flicks it away down to fine leg fielder for a single
full and bit wide outside off, left alone
short in length, just outside off, goes back and punches to cover
full on middle stump, clipped away towards leg, short midwicket fielder dive and took the pace off
Short and wide outside off, Chari cuts it hard, top edge goes all the way over third man fielder and fence for a six
good length ball, just outside off, punches to off side
back of length, just outside off, Taylor tries to cut and misses it
full ball, on middle stump, drives down the ground to mid-on and good sliding save by fielder
again full ball, outside off, drives to mid-off
lovely delivery, pitches on good length, goes through the gate, clips the pad on the way through to keeper
Poor delivery, short and wide outside off, Taylor punches it away to deep point fence for four
good length ball, wide outside off, goes for the cut and misses it
full ball, on middle stump, gets right behind it and defends it back to bowler
good length ball, on off stump, comes well forward and pushes it back to bowler
full and wide outside off, goes for the drive and gets beaten
full ball, on target, defended back to bowler
full ball, on middle and leg stump, drives to mid-on
good length ball, on target, goes back and across and defends to mid-on
again bang on target, Taylor gets right behind it and defends back to bowler
full ball, Taylor tries to play a big shot over mid-off, gets the outer part of the bat and goes just over extra cover fielder
back of length, just outside off and moves away, Taylor tries to punch and beaten
full ball, on off stump, defended back to bowler
Overpitched on middle and leg stump, Taylor clipped away off his legs and lofted it over midwicket for four
short in length, outside off, cuts it down to third man
back of length, on off stump, goes back and defends to off side
full on off stump, drives but does not find the gap at covers
again good length ball, on off stump, goes back and defends to off side
good length ball, tries to force it on the off side, gets a thick inside edge and goes to midwicket
That was a cracking shot! Full ball, on middle stump, Taylor drives up and over and it goes all the way over long-on fence for a lovely six
full ball, pitches on leg stump, angling in, tries to play across the line, misses it and takes it on the pad, big shout for lbw, turned down by umpire as it was missing leg
short ball, pulled away to deep square leg
short in length, worked away to leg side for a quick single
full ball, yorker length, digs out to leg side
again good length ball, pitches on off stump and nips back a bit, hits the pad bit high, slight shout for lbw, turned down
back of length, nips back a bit, Chari stands tall and pushes it back to bowler
good length ball, nips back a bit, tries to defend, takes it on the thigh
short ball, outside off, cuts it hard to deep point for a single
good length ball, on target, punches back to bowler
Back of length delivery, comes down the wicket and tries to play a pull shot, gets the top edge and Haider at deep square leg takes a simple catch
full ball, outside off and left alone
full ball, on target, gets right behind it and defends to mid-off
tossed up, on off stump, defended to off side
Tossed up, on middle and leg stump, went for the slog sweep and connected well, went all the way over midwicket fence for a big six
tossed up, outside off, driven to deep cover
Shot! Tossed up, wide outside off, came well forward and driven to wide of diving mid-off fielder for four
tossed up, on off stump, defended to cove
Another lovely shot! pitches on middle and leg stump, this time Williams gets across and sweeps it all the way over square leg for a six
back of length, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
Good attacking cricket by Zimbabwe! Full ball, on off stump, drives down the ground and times it well, no chance for the mid-off fielder to stop that one
short in length, outside off and left alone
Short ball, on leg stump, Williams pulls it away to deep midwicket fence for four more
good length ball, on target, defended to off side
full ball, on target, defends it back to bowler
Tossed up, just outsie off, Taylor played a reverse sweep down to third man fence for four
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to cover
on off stump, defended to cover for a quick single
on middle and leg stump, swept away down to fine leg fence for four
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to mid-off
short in length, outside off, cuts to deep cover
again tossed up, played with the turn to leg side for an easy single
arm ball, on off stump, gets forward and defends back to bowler
short in length, goes back and drives to wide of long-off fielder for couple of runs
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to off side
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, turned a bit, got the inner edge and went to short fine leg
short in length, outside off and left alone
good length ball, on off stump, gets forward and defends to gully
short in length, on off stump, goes back and defends to off side
on middle and leg stump, turned away to long leg
full ball, on middle and leg stump, defended to leg side
again full ball, on middle stump, gets right behind it and defends to short midwicket
tossed up, outside off, driven to cover
arm ball, on off stump, pushed to cover
tossed up, on target, pushed to point
Tossed up, on off stump, went for the sweep, got the top edge but still timed it well to wide of midwicket fielder for four
tossed up, outside off, pushed to cover
on off stump, leans well forward and drives to long-off
short in length, punches it to deep point and good diving stop by Abid saved couple of runs
good length ball, on off stump, angles it down to third man
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
back of length, stands tall and punches to cover
good length ball, on off stump, defended to off side
short in length, punches to deep cover
on middle and leg stump, swept away to deep square leg
faster ball, just outside off, played a lovely reverse sweep wide of point fielder for four
arm ball, on middle stump, gets forward, inside edge onto pad
again tossed up, on off stump, pushed to cover
short in length, outside off, cuts to deep cover for couple
tossed up, bit slower in pace, came well forward and pushed back to bowler
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side
good yorker, swings in late, Williams defends it back to bowler
yorker followed by a short ball, Williams sways away and lets it go
good length ball, just ouside off, nips back a bit, plays and misses
fuller in length, on off stump, gets forward and drives to short cover
good length ball, on off stump, angles it to wide of gully fielder and coms back for the 2nd run
That is a big wicket. Tossed up, on middle stump, went for the sweep shot, fails to clear the square leg fence, Imam at deep square leg took a straight forward catch
tossed up, middle stump. came forward and defended
again tossed up, pushed to off side
tossed up, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
again tossed up, came well forward and defended back
again defended on the front foot back to bowler
short ball, pulls it down to fine leg
full ball, on off stump, defended back to bowler
full on target, came well forward and defended back to bowler
fuller in length, just outside off, comes forward and pushes to short cover
low full toss on leg stump, works it away to deep imidwicket fence for four
full ball, on off stump, defended to off side
tossed up, outside off, driven to deep cover
on middle and leg stump, swept away and beat the backward square leg fielder for four
on middle stump, came forward and defends to leg side for an easy single
arm ball, on off stump, punches to point
slightly short in length, cuts to short third man
short in ength, goes back and drives, short cover makes a diving stop
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
short in length, outside off, angles it down to third man for a single
short in length, punches to point, Madhevere wants a single, sent back by Williams
good length ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
Top shot! Short in length, on middle and leg stump, pulls it away to deep midwicket fence for four
short in length, on leg stump. clipped away to deep square leg for a single
tossed up, came well forward and pushed to cover
Excellent catch by Fakhar who was fielding for injured Musa. Well tossed up, came down the wicket and lofted in the air, mistimed it, Fakhar running in dive forward and took a lovely catch at long-on
tossed up, on off stump, guided to gully
from wide of the crease, tossed up, came well forward and defended back
arm ball, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
turn and bounce for Iftikhar, goes for the cut and misses it
short in length, outside off, cuts and misses
full ball, on off stump, defended to gully
short in length, chipped in the air well short of deep cover fielder
full ball, on off stump, pushes to off side
good length ball, just outside off, punches to deep cover
good length ball, on target, defended to off side
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
tossed up, outside off, driven to short cover
faster ball, went back and pushed back to bowler
Soft dismissal! Tossed up, on middle and leg stump, Raza chipped it back to bowler for a simple catch, Iftikhar strikes again!
tossed up, on middle stump, went for the sweep, top edge down to fine leg for couple
on middle and leg stump, swept away down to fine leg
good length ball, on leg stump, tries to work it away, takes it on the thigh
full ball, outside off, angles it down to third man for a single
short ball, goes back and guides it down to third man
full on leg stump, clipped away towards deep midwicket for couple of runs
full ball on target, comes well forward and defends to cover
full ball, on off stump, drives to wide of mid-off for a single
tossed outside off, went back and pushed back to bowler
again tossed up, pushed to cover

Gone! Arm ball, from round the wicket, pitches on middle and off, misses the sweep and hits the pad, right in front, big shout for lbw, up goes the finger. Review has been taken and it plumb, hitting middle stump
tossed up, on target, defended on the front foot
arm ball, just outside off, tries to push at it and gets beaten
tossed up, outside off and Mumba beaten again
short in length, outside off, cuts it down to third man and Rauf stops with his foot
short in length, outside off, punches to point
full ball, just outside off and moves away, goes for the drive and gets beaten
full and wide outside off, Williams drives to extra cover, fielder chases hard, dives at the end but in vain, ball wins the race
full ball, on off stump, defended to mid-off
good length ball, outside off, cuts it down to third man for a single
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, swept away to deep midwicket for couple
Another sweep as ball was pitched on leg stump, found the gap at fine leg fence for four
tossed up, came down the wicket and driven to long-on for a single
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, turned to midwicket
arm ball, on off stump, pushed to cover
tossed up, on middle stump, went for the big heave, little inside edge onto pad saved him
short ball, pulled it hard and sharp stop by short midwicket fielder
good length ball, goes for the pull, thick inside edge onto pad and runs a quick single
good length ball, down the leg side, off the pad through to keeper who made a diving stop
full and wide outside off, driven to deep cover
good length ball, on off stump, punches to point
full ball, on middle stump, tries to defend, thick inside edge onto pad, big shout for lbw, turned down by umpire
Shot! Tossed up, outside off, played a lovely reverse sweep and found the gap at gully and short third man
That's Iftikhar 5-wicket haul! Nicely tossed up, Williams came down the wicket and lofted high in the air, Shaheen at long-off running in and took a lovely forwad diving catch
tossed up, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
again well tossed up, defended on the front foot
tossed up, outside off, defended on the front foot
nicely tossed up, outside off, went for the drive, mistimed it back to bowler
full ball, on leg stump, defended on the front foot
full ball, outside off, driven to deep cover, misfielded by Haider and Mumba back for the 2nd run
short in length, goes for the pull shot and misses it
good yorker on middle stump, defended to off side
full ball, on target, defended back to bowler
again full ball, on middle stup, driven to short cover
arm ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
arm ball, on off stump, punches to short cover
Dropped! Tossed up, on middle and leg stump, slog sweep and went straight in the hands of Haider who put it down
arm ball, down the leg side and called a wide
arm ball, on leg stump, clips the pad and good take by keeper
short in length, outside off, cuts and misses
tossed up, bit slower in pace, defended on the front foot
yorker from round the wicket, goes under the bat and just missed the off stump
another yorker, follows the batsman, defends it to point
low full toss on middle stump, pushes to short cover
Full ball, on middle stump, whips it away to deep midwicket and Abid does no pick that one and it goes for four
full ball, driven to mid-off and ran a quick single
fuller in length, on off stump, driven to deep cover
tossed up, on off stump, defended to gully for a quick single
on middle and leg stump, slog sweep along the ground to deep midwicket
full ball, yorker length, whips it away to deep midwicket
tossed up, wide outside off and spun away, went for the big shot and missed it
short in length, driven to long-off
Haider dropped it again! Tossed up, went for the big slog sweep, went high in the air, Haider running in, juggled a bit and dropped at the end
Full ball, on middle and leg stump, Muzarabani heved it away, connected it well and flat six over midwicket
back over the wicket, full ball, on leg stump, goes for the big shot and misses it
full ball, outside off, reaches for it and slices it over point for couple of runs
lovely yorker, just misses the leg stump through to keeper
low full toss on middle stump, slices it down to third man for a single
low full toss, drives to wide of extra cover fielder for a single
tossed up, on off stump, defended to off side for a single
tossed up, outside off and spun away, beaten outside off
Comes down the wicket and tries to play a big shot, york himself and ball hits the stumps
short in length, goes back and cuts to cover
poor delivery, faster ball, down the wicket, Rizwan dives but fails to gather the ball, goes for 5 wides
short in length on leg stump, pulls it to deep midwicket
tossed up, on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
full ball, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
another good yorker, just misses the off stump and goes through to keeper
low full toss on middle stump, defends it to mid-on
slower  ball, ends up a low full toss, drives to mid-off
another yorker on middle stump, defended back to bowler
again low full toss on off stump, drives back to bowler
Full ball, on middle stump, goes for the big shot, misses it and Musa hits the middle stump
fuller in length, just outside off, leans well forward and drives to extra cover
back of length, on off stump, goes back and pushes to gully
Great shot to gets off the mark! Full on off stump, comes forward and just time and finds the gap at covers for four
Cover drive followed by a pull shot! slightly short in length, on off stump, Imam pulls it away and keeps it down to wide of backward square leg fielder for four
back of length, on off stump, punches to point
good length ball, angling down the leg side through to keeper for a wide
back of length, stands tall and defends to leg side, thinks about a run but decided against it
short in length, outside off, cuts it to backward point for a single and gets off the mark
good length ball, just outside off and left alone
lovely delivery, pitches on middle stump and moves away, Imam tries to defend and gets beaten
good length ball, pushes to cover, wants a single, sent back by Abid with a loud NO
full ball, on middle stump, gets right behind it and defends to mid-on
full ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off and runs a risky single, Abid was too slow to react at bowling end, fielder throw was bit wide and no damage done
back of length, tries to pull, mistimes to leg side
good length ball, on middle stump, tucks it away to short midwicket
full ball, on middle stump, pushes to wide of mid-on for a single
good length ball, worked away to long leg for a single
full ball, on off stump, drives to wide of mid-off for a single
back of length, on off stump, punches to cover
Top shot! Overpitched just outside off, Imam played a glorious cover drive and no chance for the cover fielder
good length ball, outside off and left alone
back of length, outside off and angling away, lets it go
good length  ball, on leg stump, turned to midwicket, Abid wanted a single, sent back by Imam
fuller in length, on leg stump, turned away to fine leg for a single
full ball, just outside off and moves away, Abid goes for the drive and misses it
good length ball, on leg stump, tries to flick it away, inside edge onto pad and goes to fine leg
Slightly short in length, Abid pulls it away to deep midwicket fence for four
full ball, outside off, goes for the drive, edges it down to third man for a single
full ball, on off stump, pushed bcak to bowler
good length ball, on leg stump, turned away down to fine leg for couple of runs
good length ball, on off stump, punches to cover
full ball, on off stump, defended back to bowler
good length ball, on leg stump, turned to midwicket
from wide of the crease, pitches just outside off and moves away, Abid tries to push at it and gets beaten
full ball, on leg stump, tries to flick it away, misses and off the pad to leg side for a legbye
short in length, outside off, drives to cover
short ball, goes for the pull shot, gets beaten by pace, just clear the mid-on fielder for couple of runs
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to short cover
full ball, on target, defended back to bowler
again good length, comes down the wicket and tries to hit it over midwicket, mistimes again
Fuller in length, just outside off, drives on the up and in the air just wide of diving cover fielder for four
full ball, on off stump, pushes to mid-off for a quick single
short and wide outside off, cuts it well but does not find the gap at point
Slightly short in length, Abid picks up the length and pulls it away over backward square leg for four
full ball, on middle and leg stump, pushes to mid-on
full ball, on leg stump, comes down the wicket to play a big shot, inside edge onto pad
back of length, punches to wide of mid-off for a quick single
full ball, on off stump, drives straight and hits the stumps at bowling end
good length ball, outside off, angles it to gully for a single
Short and wide outside off, Imam cuts it away to backward point fence for four
another short ball, Imam just angles that one and this time third man fielder fumbles and cost four more
full and wide outside off, left alone
short in length, on leg stump, tucked away to long leg for couple
short and wide outside off, cuts and good diving stop by Raza
good length ball, outside off, cuts to cover and runs a risky single, fielder missed the stumps at bowling end Imam was no way near the crease and one run extra for the over throw
full and wide way down the leg side and no chance for the keeper to stop that one
full ball, on leg stump, off the pad through to keeper
full ball well down the leg side for a wide
Shot! Fuller in ength, on off stump, comes well forward and drives to extra cover fence for four
full ball, on off stump, drives to mid-off
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to point for a single
short and wide outside off, goes for the cut and misses it, keeper also misses that one and cost four byes
good length ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
Short and wide outside off, Abid hits it very hard and Ervine at short cover takes a very sharp catch
short in length, outside off, cuts to deep cover
tossed up, on leg stump, tried to play on the leg side, closed his bt bit early, leading edge along the ground back to bowler
short in length, on leg stump, turned away to leg side
arm ball, on off stump, pushes to deep cover for a single
on middle and leg stump, worked away to deep square leg
full ball, on leg stump, pushes back to bowler
on middle and leg stump, turned to long leg for a single
good length ball, on target, gets right behind it and defends it back to bowler
Shot! Fuller in length, on middle and leg stump, flicks it away off his toes to deep square leg fence for four
That was even better! Full ball, on middle and leg stump, Babar played a lovely on drive between mid-on and midwicket for four
again on leg stump, flicked away to deep square leg
short and wide outside off, cuts to deep cover
short ball, punches to cover
tossed up on leg stump, turned to square leg
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
on leg stump, hits the pad and missing leg, shout for lbw, turned down by umpire
short in length, on leg stump, turned to deep square leg
tossed up, down the leg side for a wide
on leg stump, flicked away to short fine leg for couple of runs
short and wide outside off, drives to extra cover for couple of runs
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to cover
on middle and leg stump, worked away to leg side for couple of runs
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to off side
arm ball, on target, defended on the front foot
tossed up, on off stump, came forward and defended
tossed up, outside off, driven to deep cover
tossed up, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
short in length, outside off, cuts it late down to third man for three runs
tossed up, on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up, outside off, driven to wide of long-off and came back for the 2nd run
arm ball, on middle stump, defended back to bowler
on middle and leg stump, worked away to square leg
arm ball, on off stump, goes back and pushes to point
short in length, outside off, cuts it to point
on middle and leg stump, drives down the ground to long-on for a single
faster ball, drives back to bowler, Madhevere dives across and stops the ball
tossed up, came down the wicket and turned to midwicket

tossed up, on leg stump, tried to flick it away, looked like off the pad to keeper, big shout for caught behind, turned down, review has been taken, replay shows that it was a slight edge on the way to keeper, umpire has to reversed his decision
arm ball, on off stump, cuts it late and it goes through the hands of slip
arm ball, on off stump, tries to defend, inside edge onto pad
short in length, outside off, punches to cover
tossed up, outside off, driven to point
tossed up, on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up, outside off, driven to deep cover
short in length, just outside off, cuts to deep point for couple of runs
again short in length, outside off, tries to cut, mistimes to off side
Dropped! short in length, outside off, goes for the cut, edges it and Taylor juggles with it and dropped at the end
short in length, outside off, cuts to off side
Shot! Tossed up, on middle and leg stump, lofted drive well over mid-on for four
tossed up, on off stump, driven to long-off
tossed up, on off stump, pushed to cover
again tossed up, driven to short cover
arm ball, on off stump, pushed back to bowler
bit slower in the air, short in length, Babar punches to lojng-on
on middle and leg stump, pushed to leg side
Shot! Tossed up, on middle stump, cleared his left leg and hit it straight up and over long-on fence for a six
tossed up, on off stump, driven down the ground to long-off
nicely tossed up, driven to deep cover for a single
tossed up, on middle stump, pushed back to bowler
short in length, on leg stump, punches to long-on
arm ball, on off stump, pushes back to bowler
again tossed up, bit slower in the air, Haider defended on the front foot
What a shot! Short and fast on leg stump, Haider down on one knee and pulls it away over backward square leg for a six
arm ball, on leg stump, flicks it away down to fine leg for couple of runs
on middle and leg stump, swept away to deep midwicket for couple more
tossed up, on middle and leg stump, came down the wicket and chipped it over midwicket for three runs
arm ball, just outside off, angles it to gully
short in length, outside off, cuts away to deep point
arm ball, on off stump, driven back to bowler
arm ball, on middle and leg, defended on the front foot

arm ball, on middle stump, tries to play a sweep shot, looks like ball clips the gloves and hits the pad, shout for lbw and up goes the finger of umpire, review has been taken and it shows that no bat or gloves invloved and ball hitting middle
full ball, on off stump, pushes to cover
good lengtb ball, off stump, gets right behind it and defends to point
full ball, on middle stump, driven to mid-on
good length ball, just outside off, angles it down to third man and comes back for the 2nd run
